column6: "Select which regions to include in the natura raster. Either include all selected countries (counties)
column7: the entire cutout (cutout) or the entire globe (global)."

Description: "[m] Grid resolution of the natura output data."
"[bytes] Size of the shifting rasterization window. The required RAM scales with window_size^2"

column5: default: m] Buffer around the regions of interest to include every required value. A buffer of around 100 km will be sufficient for most cases."
